```{r corrfunc, cache=cacheon, fig.cap="Correlation of all QI pairs"}

corrdata <- rsdata %>%
  select(!!!syms(qivars)) %>%
  mutate_all(as.numeric)

names(corrdata) <- qivarsmeta %>%
  filter(qivar %in% names(corrdata)) %>%
  pull(qiname)

cor <- rcorr(as.matrix(corrdata), type = c("spearman"))

corrplot(cor$r,
  method = c("color"), type = "upper", tl.pos = "n", na.label = "square", na.label.col = "grey", diag = FALSE,
  p.mat = cor$P, insig = "label_sig", sig.level = c(0.05, 0.01, 0.001), pch.cex = 0.8, cl.pos = "r", mar = c(1, 2, 0, 0) + 0.1
)
corrplot(cor$r,
  add = TRUE, type = "lower", method = "number",
  tl.pos = "d", cl.pos = "n", col = "black", na.label = "-", tl.col = "red", number.cex = 0.9
)
```
